org.miktim.websocket

Class WebSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.miktim.websocket.WebSocket

  • public class WebSocket
extends java.lang.Object
    WebSocket servers and client connections factory.

        public WebSocket()
          throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Creates WebSocket factory.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if SHA1 algorithm not exists

      • WebSocket

        public WebSocket(java.net.InetAddress intfAddr)
          throws java.net.SocketException,
                 java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Creates WebSocket factory on network interface.
        Parameters:
        intfAddr - network interface address for servers/connections.
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException - if interface does not exists.
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if SHA1 algorithm not exists.

        Parameters:

      • closeAll

        public void closeAll(java.lang.String closeReason)
        Closes all servers/connections within this WebSocket instance.

        Connections close status code 1001 (GOING_AWAY).

        Parameters:
        closeReason - connection close reason. String of 123 BYTES length.
        See Also:
        WsStatus

      • closeAll

        public void closeAll()
        Closes all servers/connections within this WebSocket instance.

        Connections close status code 1001 (GOING_AWAY).

        See Also:
        WsStatus

        Creates WebSocket server for plaintext connections.
        Parameters:
        port - listening port.

        public WsServer SecureServer(int port,
                             WsConnection.Handler handler,
                             WsParameters wsp)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Creates WebSocket server for TLS connections.

      • connect

        public WsConnection connect(java.lang.String uri,
                            WsConnection.Handler handler,
                            WsParameters wsp)
                     throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                            java.io.IOException,
                            java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Creates and starts client connection.
        Parameters:
        uri - connection uri string like:
        scheme://[user-info@]host[:port][/path][?query][#fragment]
        - uri's scheme (ws: | wss:) and host are required;
        - :port, /path and ?query are optional;
        - user-info@ and #fragment are ignored.
        handler - client side connection handler.
        wsp - client side connection parameters.
        Returns:
        WebSocket client connection instance.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        java.io.IOException
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException
